name: Ardian Saputra - Electronic engineering technology
description: I am a Diploma 4 (D4) graduate in Electronic Engineering with strong technical expertise in embedded systems, IoT, microcontroller programming (Arduino, Raspberry Pi, STM32), PCB design (Altium, Eagle), as well as signal processing and control systems, complemented by proficient programming skills (C/C++, Python, MATLAB) for analytical and efficient problem-solving. Highly adaptable and a strong team player, I thrive in collaborative environments and excel at communicating complex technical concepts to both technical and non-technical audiences. Passionate about cutting-edge technology, I am committed to contributing innovative electronic solutions in industry, research, and product development while continuously enhancing my technical proficiency and soft skills, including problem-solving, creativity, and time management.
